guideLinesLanguagesLocale: Warning: Do not alter the DO_NOT_CHANGE and currentLocale fields. They are linked to the website language. For example, changing 'en' to 'en_US' will lead to a non-existent page (e.g., https://excellence-conciergerie.com/en_US). Existing locales are pt, en, fr, es. Do not add non-existent locales. Only modify based on the current translation file. fr/common.js currentLocale should always be 'fr', en/common.js currentLocale should always be 'en', etc.
guideLinesLinks: Warning: The only accepted values for the DO_NOT_CHANGE fields in navLinks are the current website IDs, which are as follows: about, whyUs, message, subscriptions, services, faq, contact
guideLinesFormTypeOptions: Warning Text: Don't alter the DO_NOT_CHANGE fields. Don't add a new extra formTypeOptions object. Don't remove a existing object. If you need more forms options, contact me so I can insert it for you.

formTypeOptions.label: I want to know more about subscriptions

formTypeHelperText: For general questions, please fill out this form. If you are a homeowner, select 'I'm a homeowner' from the dropdown menu. If you want to know more about subscriptions, choose 'I want to know more about subscriptions'. If you have a question, select 'I have a question'.
thankYouForYourSubmission: Thank you for your submission. We will respond to you shortly.

array.title: 1. Introduction
array.description: Welcome to our website. If you continue to browse and use this website, you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which together with our privacy policy govern our relationship with you in relation to this website.

array.title: 2. License to use website
array.description: Unless otherwise stated, we or our licensors own the intellectual property rights in the website and material on the website. Subject to the license below, all these intellectual property rights are reserved.

array.title: 3. Acceptable use
array.description: You must not use this website in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of the website; or in any way which is unlawful, illegal, fraudulent or harmful, or in connection with any unlawful, illegal, fraudulent or harmful purpose or activity.

array.title: 4. Limitations of liability
array.description: We will not be liable to you (whether under the law of contact, the law of torts or otherwise) in relation to the contents of, or use of, or otherwise in connection with, this website: for any indirect, special or consequential loss; or for any business losses, loss of revenue, income, profits or anticipated savings, loss of contracts or business relationships, loss of reputation or goodwill, or loss or corruption of information or data.

array.title: 1. Information we collect
array.description: We may collect the following information: name, contact information including email address, demographic information such as postcode, preferences, and interests, other information relevant to customer surveys and/or offers.

array.title: 2. What we do with the information we gather
array.description: We require this information to understand your needs and provide you with a better service, and in particular for the following reasons: internal record keeping, improvement of our products and services, sending promotional emails about new products, special offers or other information which we think you may find interesting using the email address which you have provided.

array.title: 3. Security
array.description: We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. In order to prevent unauthorized access or disclosure, we have put in place suitable physical, electronic and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.

array.title: 4. How we use cookies
array.description: A cookie is a small file which asks permission to be placed on your computer's hard drive. Once you agree, the file is added and the cookie helps analyze web traffic or lets you know when you visit a particular site. Cookies allow web applications to respond to you as an individual. The web application can tailor its operations to your needs, likes and dislikes by gathering and remembering information about your preferences.

heroTitle: Unforgettable Experiences and Discreet Luxury Services in Côte d'Azur

introductionDescription.text: We are not a real estate agency, but a concierge service specialized in seasonal property management on the French Riviera.

With our channel manager, we publish your property on several platforms (Airbnb, Booking, etc.) while simplifying management: a single account for the owner, synchronized calendars, and transparent performance reports.

whyUsDescription: Discover why clients trust Excellence Concierge for exceptional luxury property management services on the French Riviera and in Nice. We combine expertise, personalization, and efficiency to manage properties with unparalleled professionalism and meticulous attention to detail.

whyUsReasons.title: Turnkey Service
whyUsReasons.description: From listing your properties to cleaning and personalized guest reception, we manage every step of seasonal rental. With our in-house team and expertise, you gain peace of mind while ensuring a flawless hospitality experience.

whyUsReasons.title: Premium Concierge
whyUsReasons.description: To meet the demands of a discerning clientele, we offer high-end services: private chef, in-home massages, excursion arrangements, VIP transfers, etc. Our goal: to enhance every stay and create unforgettable moments for your guests.

whyUsReasons.title: Optimized Profitability
whyUsReasons.description: We implement tailored pricing strategies, professional visuals, and constant monitoring of guest reviews to maximize your revenue. Our knowledge of the local market and mastery of booking tools enable us to adjust prices dynamically and appropriately.

whyUsReasons.title: Responsiveness and Quality
whyUsReasons.description: Our in-house cleaning team ensures an impeccable level of cleanliness for every arrival. We also provide 24/7 assistance for guests and a detailed report for the owner to ensure transparency and satisfaction for all.

whyUsReasons.title: Quality Control and Personalized Welcome
whyUsReasons.description: To maintain a high standard, we have a housekeeper who checks the condition and cleanliness before each arrival. Additionally, we offer a personalized welcome kit to make each guest feel at home right away. This attention to detail guarantees an exceptional stay.

messageDescription: Welcome to Excellence Conciergerie. As the General Director, I am delighted to welcome you. For property owners, we care for your property with passion and confidentiality in Côte d'Azur and Nice. For travelers, we promise an exceptional and discreet experience. Excellence Conciergerie embodies refinement, discretion, and personal attention. Welcome to excellence.
servicesTitle: With Excellence Concierge, free yourself from logistical constraints and live every moment in complete peace of mind.

services.title: Local Expertise
services.description: We know every corner of the French Riviera to provide you with authentic and luxurious experiences. Let us open the doors to iconic and secret spots for you. We know every corner of the French Riviera to provide you with authentic and luxurious experiences. Let us open the doors to iconic and secret spots for you.

pros.text: In-depth knowledge of the French Riviera: We guide you to must-see places and secret addresses, offering a stay filled with luxury and authenticity.
Network of local providers: Artisans, producers, boat rental services… We carefully select each partner to ensure flawless quality.
Personalized advice: Looking for a gourmet restaurant or a private beach? We tailor our recommendations to your desires and lifestyle.
Cultural immersion: Discover the true essence of the Riviera, its heritage, traditions, and enjoy local events that are rarely accessible to tourists.

services.title: Partner Network
services.description: Enjoy exclusive benefits through our collaborations with prestigious establishments. Your stay takes on a whole new dimension, with privileges and unique discoveries.

pros.text: Prestigious partners: We collaborate with Michelin-starred chefs, renowned spas, event organizers, and exceptional venues.
Priority access & privileges: Last-minute reservations, VIP spots, exclusive discounts… Our network opens doors often closed to the general public.
Unique experiences: Private tastings, yacht tours, private parties: we create extraordinary moments through our contacts.
Guaranteed quality: All our partners are rigorously selected to ensure top-notch services in every field.

services.title: Quality & Trust
services.description: Our multilingual team is trained to meet your most demanding expectations, with discretion. Enjoy impeccable service where every detail matters.

pros.text: Multilingual & trained team: We speak several languages fluently to welcome and serve an international clientele with professionalism.
Discretion and privacy: Your information and requests are handled confidentially, with the highest ethical standards.
Availability 24/7: We are always reachable to anticipate or manage any unforeseen events: travel issues, medical emergencies, or simple plan changes.
Quality control process: Systematic checks (housekeeper, personalized welcome kit), post-service follow-ups, guest feedback: every detail is scrutinized to maintain our standard of excellence.

services.title: Absolute Flexibility
services.description: We tailor our services to your desires, whether it's leisure, business travel, or daily comfort services.

pros.text: Custom services: Private chef, massage, event tickets, private excursions: we personalize each request according to your preferences.
Adapted to your rhythm: Whether you’re on a business trip or vacation, our concierge adjusts to your needs and schedule.
Solutions for both professionals and individuals: Meeting organization, company transfers, schedule management… We cater to both business and leisure needs.
End-to-end support: From simple reservations to organizing complex events, we take care of everything, so you can fully enjoy your stay without any stress.

packsSubtitle: The perfect plan for every lifestyle.

packs.title: Basic Excellence
packs.subTitle: Monday to Friday, from 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM

pros.text: Weekday assistance, fixed hours.
Ideal for planned needs.
Help with simple reservations.
Affordable and functional service.

packs.title: Premium Excellence
packs.subTitle: 7 days a week, from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM

pros.text: Extended coverage, including weekends.
Priority access to our partners.
Enhanced responsiveness to your requests.
Perfect for more flexible support.
Unlimited assistance, day and night.
Emergency management and special requests.
VIP access to all our services.
Unlimited high-end experience.

faq.title: 1. How does Excellence Concierge differ from a real estate agency?
faq.description: We do not carry out any transactions (buying/selling). We specialize in seasonal rentals and provide a full service (listing, cleaning, maintenance, etc.) to optimize your income.

faq.title: 2. What services do you include in property management?
faq.description: Our team handles the listing on platforms (Airbnb, Booking, etc.), reservation synchronization, guest reception, cleaning, laundry, and overall follow-up to ensure tenant satisfaction.

faq.title: 3. How much does property management at Excellence Concierge cost?
faq.description: Our rates start at 20% excluding VAT of the gross amount of bookings paid by the guest. We provide a customized quote based on the nature and location of your property.

faq.title: 4. Who can benefit from your concierge service?
faq.description: We assist both individuals on vacation or business trips and companies wishing to offer premium comfort to their employees or VIP clients.

faq.title: 5. What luxury services do you offer?
faq.description: Our Private Concierge offers a wide range of services: private chef, massages, organization of private events, VIP reservations, transport, and much more.

faq.title: 6. What are your concierge subscription plans?
faq.description: We offer three plans: Basic (Mon-Fri), Premium (Mon-Sun, 8 AM - 8 PM), and Prestige (24/7). Each plan includes a different level of assistance, tailored to your needs.

contactDescription: Are you ready to elevate your hospitality and commit to excellence in Côte d'Azur and Nice? Please fill out the form below, and our team will contact you shortly to discuss how we can help provide unforgettable stays for your clients.
footerDescription: Excellence Conciergerie is a luxury property management agency based in Côte d'Azur and Nice. Our dedicated team offers personalized services to meet the unique needs of each owner.
thankYouDescription: We appreciate you getting in touch. Our team will review your message and respond as soon as possible.
additionalInfo: In the meantime, feel free to explore our website further.
